page.title: 04COMMUNICATION
page.content: {TELEPHONE, POST, PERSONAL. { {TELEPHONE :}VIRTUALLY ALL HOMES HAVE A TELEPHONE AND 50% PREFERRED IT AS A MEANS OF COMMUNICATION, SPEED AND HANDINESS BEING THE REASONS. INCREASINGLY MODEMS ARE BEING USED TO ENABLE COMPUTERS TO COMMUNICATE WITH EACH OTHER DIRECTLY. { POST :}ONLY 2% OF THOSE QUESTIONED USED THE POST AS THEIR FAVOURITE METHOD OF COMMUNICATION. MOST MAIL IS BUSINESS_TYPE MAIL SUCH AS BILLS, CIRCULARS, ETC. {PERSONAL :}HALF THE SAMPLE PREFERRED FACE-TO-FACE MEETINGS FOR REASONS SUCH AS CLOSER CONTACT, CHEAPNESS AND SIMPLICITY. HOWEVER PEOPLE TALK LESS TO EACH OTHER NOW THAN IN PREVIOUS GENERATIONS.
